capabilities.title: Univise
capabilities.description: Welcome to Univise - the AI-Powered Course Discovery Assistant designed to help UW-Madison students find the most suitable courses based on their interests and goals. This guide will help you effectively use the assistant and craft prompts for personalized course recommendations.

*This is a beta version; things may not always function as expected, but we are working on making it better. Please provide feedback to help us improve the assistant using the feedback button on the bottom right.*

capabilities.title: Getting Started
capabilities.description:
Type your message or question into the chat interface.
Express your interests, preferred subjects, academic goals, and any other relevant information.

capabilities.title: Crafting Effective Prompts
capabilities.description:
Be specific and detailed: state your major, interests, current year, desired skills, and goals. Indicate preferred course formats (lectures, seminars, labs).
Use clear and concise language.
Include relevant background information.
Share your academic background, completed courses, and prerequisites.
State your short-term and long-term academic or career goals.
Ask specific questions about courses, such as workload or content.

capabilities.title: Limitations
capabilities.description: Univise is currently best at helping you find and understand courses based on your interests. It is not yet able to provide real-time course availability or enrollment information, but we are working hard to add this into future updates.
